attributes.action: Change the Definition of Full Time to mean Full Time
attributes.additional_details:
It is time to get the Government to change their definition of Full Time to mean Full time i.e. Full Time work should mean a job that has at least 35 hours on offer.

Currently the Government's Definition of Full time Employment is set at 16hrs which for the normal person is not nearly enough as we are not politicians.

Please help me to change this by signing this petition.

Many thanks for your support
